MAY contain [0..1] component such that it
SHALL contain [1..1] Purpose Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.13)
SHALL satisfy: Contains exactly one documentationOf / serviceEvent
SHALL satisfy: documentationOf / serviceEvent / @classCode SHALL be 'PCPR'
SHALL satisfy: documentationOf / serviceEvent contains exactly one serviceEvent / effectiveTime / low and exactly one serviveEvent / effectiveTime / high
SHALL satisfy: languageCode has the form nn, or nn-CC. The nn portion SHALL be an ISO-639-1 language code in lower case. The CC portion, if present, SHALL be an ISO-3166 country code in upper case
SHALL satisfy: SHALL NOT contain templateId / @extension
SHALL satisfy: effectiveTime is expressed with precision to include seconds
SHALL satisfy: effectiveTime includes an explicit time zone offset
SHALL satisfy: Contains one or two recordTarget
SHOULD satisfy: Contains one or more author / assignedAuthor / assignedPerson and/or author / assignedAuthor / representedOrganization
SHALL satisfy: If author has an associated representedOrganization with no assignedPerson or assignedAuthoringDevice, then the value for author / assignedAuthor / id / @NullFlavor SHALL be 'NA'
MAY satisfy: Contains one or more informationRecipient
